item.title: What does Background Audio do?
item.dc:creator: El1011
item.description:
odd thing i’ve noticed, but if you have wireless headphones (ex airpods) auxy will let you play on the lock screen, but not when you use wired ones. not sure if it’s a bug, but it works for me lol.

Read full topic

item.title: What does Background Audio do?
item.dc:creator: Auxy
item.description:
It’s better to render audio and play back the files if you want to listen while the phone is locked. Running Auxy uses more battery so it makes little sense to run it in the background as a music player.

Read full topic

item.title: What does Background Audio do?
item.dc:creator: UDGN
item.description:
Please make it possible for the app to continue playing in the background while the phone is locked.

I’m doing the free trial now, having previously purchased a number of the packs when Auxy was based on the IAP model. I like to tweak tracks while letting them continue to play (at work) and no playback from lock screen excludes my use case. If this feature is added, you’ll have my sub.

Bonus points for stop/start/vol from headphone wire controls!

Read full topic

item.title: What does Background Audio do?
item.dc:creator: bri77
item.description:
@Auxy, I wouldn’t be so quick to disregard this. It’s too time consuming with the work around you have suggested just so I can hear Auxy audio with the iPhone locked.

Background Audio allows 100% of the following apps to run audio with the iPhone or iPad locked:

  • Egoist
  • Beatmaker 2
  • Beatmaker 3
  • Beatwave
  • Figure
  • Triqtraq
  • Caustic
  • Cubasis
  • Nanostudio 2
  • Aphelian
  • Blocs Wave
  • Groovebox
  • Troublemaker
  • Garageband
  • Grooverider
  • Yellofier
  • KRFT
  • Korg Gadget 2
  • Korg Electribe Wave
  • Korg iDS-10
  • Elastic drums
  • Music Studio
  • BeatHawk
  • iMaschine 2
  • iMPC Pro 2
  • Stagelight
  • Medly

These are just a few I quickly tested. It appears to be standard to allow this so it seems Auxy is definitely lacking this functionality.

Interestingly, why does Auxy Classic on my iPad allow audio to run with the iPad locked?

Read full topic

item.title: What does Background Audio do?
item.dc:creator: Auxy
item.description:
It’s not meant to be for letting Auxy run while you lock the phone and put it in your pocket. This requires some additional bg audio stuff I think. If you want to listen to your tracks, it’s better to render and send them to some music player app.

Read full topic

item.title: What does Background Audio do?
item.dc:creator: bri77
item.description:
@Auxy - I don’t think background audio is fully working. Auxy’s audio cuts out when the display turns off either by pressing the button on the right side of the iPhone or the set time elapses with the screen auto-lock.

I’ve checked background audio on many other apps and the audio does not cut out when the display turns off. This is useful for example if you want to play your Auxy songs with your iPhone in your pocket. Any chance you can look at this?

Read full topic
